subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: 1) Restoration and protection of livelihoods and productive assets of drought affected communities targeting displaced population, women and men. 2) Establish local infrastructure for peace, 3)Strengthen Programme management support
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: 3KEN11302 Kenya Drought Recove
